rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text: [i]The Heap's dungeons are punishing, tricky environments for those who believe life requires challenge.[/i]

if common: Intricate Heap
The Heap is a mass of dungeons; punishing, tricky environments for those who believe life requires challenge.
